name: Toast it Up
description:
Seems like breakfast is delayed, as a little toast finds itself helpless at the bottom of the oven. Help it out by jumping from toaster to toaster through endless dangers. Watch out for heat hazards as fire, hot surfaces and more as you get higher and higher.
Try skillful jumps to collect butter scattered inside the oven and unlock lots of skins for your toast and the toaster.
Challenge your friends to beat your score and take over the leaderboards.
Lets see how high you and your toast can go!
